The data can be found in the [National Bureau of Statistics](https://nigerianstat.gov.ng/elibrary/read/1241119) website, it contains the record of prices of various commodities in all state including the capital in Nigeria.   
The analysis was conducted on the 26th of match 2022.  
  
<br>

### Reason for the analysis.  

The food commodity analysis was conducted majorly to practice and build up my data analysis skills using R and the tidyverse by automating repetitive tasks using functions to explore and understand major trends and pattern in the data.     
  
**Author:** Akinwande Ayomide.
